analysis.description:
UacCrowdsale.wallet (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1230) shadows:
	- CrowdsaleBase.wallet (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#372)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#609-622):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#611-612)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#614-616)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#626-637):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#631-633)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#633)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#634-635)

UacCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1344-1345) does not use the value returned by external calls:

UacCrowdsale.finalise (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1354-1373) does not use the value returned by external calls:

CrowdsaleBase.started (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#418-426) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= start (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#419-426)

CrowdsaleBase.ended (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#435-442) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= end (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#437-442)

CrowdsaleBase.validPurchase (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#530-541) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= start && block.timestamp <= end) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#540-541)

UbiatarPlayVault.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1037-1053) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > start.add(vesting_offsets[i]) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1045-1051)

PresaleTokenVault.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1134-1175) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= start (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1138-1149)
	- block.timestamp >= cliff && block.timestamp < end (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1149-1174)
	- block.timestamp >= end (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1174-1175)

UacCrowdsale.price (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1297-1310) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= start.add(BONUS_DURATION_1) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1298-1309)
	- block.timestamp <= start.add(BONUS_DURATION_3) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1307-1309)
	- block.timestamp <= start.add(BONUS_DURATION_2) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1302-1309)

UacCrowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1346-1352) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= START_TIME && block.timestamp < END_TIME) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1347-1349)

UacCrowdsale.finalise (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1354-1373) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(didOwnerEndCrowdsale || block.timestamp > end || capReached) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7bb2a779401c4420b181c4058e5dd52aeb313131.sol#1355)
